Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, estimated to be well beyond its market value. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950000, aiming to make this exceptional acquisition more accessible to you.

The product boasts unparalleled quality, craftsmanship, and functionality, making it a true masterpiece. It has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards, ensuring it stands out in its category.

Considering its rarity and the value it brings, I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to own something truly special. I would be honored if you could accept this offer and make this product yours.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this exciting opportunity with you further.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
